entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump To be followed by biggest fall on Monday. You LIED at press conference on Friday. Google isn't building a national website. And you may have given CEOs of some of our biggest companies coronavirus by shaking their hands. 4 people at Mar-a-lago tested positive. Likely you have it
